name: Environmental Impact of Inhalers
title: MDIs prescribed as a proportion of all inhalers, excluding salbutamol
description: MDIs prescribed as a proportion of all inhalers in BNF Chapter 3, excluding salbutamol
why_it_matters: to reducing its carbon footprint by 51% by 2025 to meet the target in the Climate Change Act including a shift to dry powdered
inhalers (DPI) to deliver a reduction of 4%.  DPIs are less harmful  to the enviroment than traditional metered
dose inhalers (MDIs) and the NHS long term plan supports the use of DPI where it is clinically appropriate.
